isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-rings on the extended front hub of the front auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 223).

figure.caption: Figure 223. Install O-Rings on Extended Front Hub

step1.para: Install the retainer ring on the front auxiliary drive gear, snap ring groove facing the front hub and away from the gear teeth ( Figure 224).

figure.caption: Figure 224. Install Retainer Ring on Front Auxiliary Drive Gear

step1.para: Start the front auxiliary drive gear bearing on the front hub, bearing snap ring facing the groove in the retainer ring ( Figure 225). Using both hands, press the bearing on the gear with the snap ring in the groove of the retainer ring (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 225. Start Front Auxiliary Drive Gear Bearing on Front Hub

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove of the front gear hub to retain the bearing ( Figure 226).

figure.caption: Figure 226. Install Snap Ring in Front Gear Hub Groove
